scripts¶

geometry¶

Tools to manipulate geometries.

If in REPL, use CTRL+D to exit.

geometry [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

create¶

Creates a new geometry from .geojson file.

I is the input .geogson file O is the output .ogeom file GEOTYPE is the type of geometry to be created

geometry create [OPTIONS] I O

Options

--geotype <geotype>¶

Type of geometry to be loaded

Arguments

I¶

Required argument

O¶

Required argument

repl¶

Start an interactive shell. All subcommands are available in it.

param old_ctx

The current Click context.

param prompt_kwargs

Parameters passed to prompt_toolkit.shortcuts.prompt().

If stdin is not a TTY, no prompt will be printed, but only commands read from stdin.

geometry repl [OPTIONS]

show¶

Shows a geometry in a 2D or 3D plot.

I is the input .ogeom file DIM allows to choose between 2D or 3D plot

geometry show [OPTIONS] I

Options

--dim <dim>¶

2 or 3 for 2d or 3d plot.

Arguments

I¶

Required argument
